News.Title: Digikore Studios Targets Revenue of Over 600 Million Rupees for FY25-26
News.Summary: Digikore Studios has set a revenue target of over 600 million rupees for FY25-26, aiming to achieve an 18% profit margin during this period.

News.Title: Digikore Studios Enters AI Music Market
News.Summary: Digikore Studios has announced its entry into the $30 billion AI music market with an innovative technology. This move represents a significant expansion for the company into a rapidly growing sector of the technology and entertainment industry.

News.Title: Digikore Studios Introduces Revolutionary Ad Production Technology
News.Summary: Digikore Studios has unveiled a new technology that has the potential to significantly disrupt the traditional advertising production industry. This innovative system is capable of creating customized, high-quality video advertisements, which could revolutionize how ads are produced and potentially reduce costs and time in the advertising sector.

News.Title: Digikore Studios Creates World's First Fully AI-Generated 30-Second Video
News.Summary: Digikore Studios has achieved a significant milestone by becoming the first visual effects (VFX) company globally to produce a fully AI-generated 30-second video content. This breakthrough demonstrates the company's innovative capabilities in leveraging artificial intelligence for video production.
